top_candidates.name: makalin/SecureMCP
top_candidates.description: SecureMCP is a security auditing tool designed to detect vulnerabilities and misconfigurations in applications using the [Model Context Protocol (MCP)](https://modelcontextprotocol.io/introduction). It proactively identifies threats like OAuth token leakage, prompt injection vulnerabilities, rogue MCP servers, and tool poisoning attacks.
top_candidates.integration_suggestion: Medium priority: Code quality and security improvements
